name: com.nrvr.utilities.polymorphic-properties
description:
A system for working with polymorphism within MonoBehaivour/ScriptableObject properties. 
eg, if you want to have a property which could be one of many implementations, 
this system allows working with that property in the editor: 
a drop down with all the options is displayed, once selected, you see the fields for that 
specific implementation.
